mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, username, email, password, nickname, profile_image, bio, is_pro, enabled, provider, provider_id, created_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, #{bio}, #{isPro}, #{enabled}, #{provider}, #{providerId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, profile_image = #{profileImage}, bio = #{bio}, is_pro = #{isPro}, enabled = #{enabled}, provider = #{provider}, provider_id = #{providerId}, created_at = #{createdAt} WHERE id = #{id}
